subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|犬|alt1=犭|㞷|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=dog}}. The latter is the ancient form of {{och-l|往|to go}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|of dogs}} to go [[crazy]]; to [[act]] [[aggressively]]
# [[mad]]; [[insane]]; [[crazy]]
# [[wildly]] [[arrogant]]; [[conceited]]; [[stiff-necked]]
# [[unruly]]; [[unrestrained]]
# [[violent]]; [[ferocious]]
# [[roaring]]; [[enormous]]
# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} [[flustered]]; [[hurried]]
# {{lb|zh|Min Dong}} to [[become]] [[angry]]
# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} to be [[hot]] for; to be [[crazy]] about
# {{lb|zh|Min Nan|of animal}} to be [[in heat]]
# {{†}} {{zh-original|誑|to [[cheat]]; to [[deceive]]}}
# {{†}} {{zh-alt-form|往|to [[go]] to}}
